Title: Relates to employer liability for on-duty assaults of employees
Summary: Provides that if any employee, engaged in the service of any commuter rail service owned or operated by the authority or its subsidiaries, shall suffer a physical and/or mental injury that is caused by a passenger, customer or member of the public while the employee is performing an assigned duty, the employer shall be held liable for any health care costs attributable to such injury; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Ren §1266-l to be §1266-n, add §1266-o, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to employer liability for on-duty assaults of employees
